exec: pm.test("Status code name has string", function () {
pm.test("Status code name has string", function () {

body.raw:
{
    "InterviewButtonUnavailable": "Interview button is not available",
    "TooFewAnswers": "Too few answers, minimum is {minimum}",
    "TooManyAnswers": "Too many answers, maximum is {maximum}",
    "ItemAnswerRequired": "Please specify an answer for {item}",
    "CategoryAnswerRequired": "Please specify an answer for {category}",
    "AnswerRequired": "An answer is required",
    "NotInRange": "Answer {answer} is not in the permitted range, permitted range is {range}",
    "TooManyDigitsInIntegerPart": "Answer {answer} has too many digits, maximum is {maximum}",
    "LessThanMinimum": "Answer {answer} is too small, minimum is {minimum}",
    "MoreThanMaximum": "Answer {answer} is too big, maximum is {maximum}",
    "MustBeNumeric": "Answer {answer} must be numeric",
    "TooManyDigitsFraction": "Answer {answer} has too many fractional digits, maximum is {maximumDigits}",
    "DoNotUseBrowserButtonToNavigate": "Do not use browser navigation buttons, use interview buttons instead",
    "ExclusiveCategory": "Category {category} cannot be used together with other categories",
    "InvalidCategory": "The chosen category is not present in the list of available categories.",
    "ButtonPause": "Pause",
    "ButtonStart": "Start",
    "ButtonClear": "Clear",
    "ButtonBack": "Back",
    "ButtonNext": "Next",
    "Name": "<language name>",
    "AnswerTooLong": "Answer {anser} is too long, maximum is {numberOfCharacters}",
    "DoNotUseButtonWithOtherAnswer": "The answer \"{item}\" cannot be used in conjunction with other answers"
}
